name.ch: 獨立研究 ：人類運動學習

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 經由學習，人類能習得相當複雜的動作序列。本課程將藉由文獻討論及實驗操作，讓修課同學掌握運動學習的認知歷程，以及其背後的腦生理機制。
goal.en: Human beings are capable of acquiring complex motor sequences via repetitive learning. In this course, the students will learn the cognitive processes and brain mechanisms underlying human motor learning via reading and discussing journal papers and carrying out experiments.

outline.ch: 透過每週的會議與討論，學生們預期能夠建立對人類運動學習研究的理論背景及實驗技巧。學生將有機會接觸各種握力測量儀器、動態捕捉、心理物理實驗等設備，並且學會Matlab程式設計的基礎技能，以協調這些設備並應用於他們對人類行動的研究。
outline.en: Through weekly meetings and discussions, the students are expected to establish theoretical backgrounds and experimental skills on the study of human motor learning. The students will be able to access various instruments of grip force measurement, motion capture, psychophysical experimentation and will acquire basic skills in Matlab programming to coordinate these equipment and apply to their study of human action.

textbook.en: weekly assigned readings by the instructor
